content.p: The University of Nottingham is a registered Disability Confident committed (Level 1) employer. Increasing employee diversity is important to us and we are committed to the aims of Disability Confident. In particular, we will: As part of our commitment to Disability Confident, we ask all applicants (within the Equal Opportunities section of the application form) if they wish to be considered under this scheme should they meet the essential criteria for the role. By opting-in to this scheme, applicants will be disclosing that they have a disability solely for the purpose of the interview guarantee. We will not assume nor infer that an applicant wishes to disclose or record their disability in any other way. Further details on the ways in which we support staff with a disability are available on the Equality and Diversity web pages. To find out more about the University's broader commitment to Equality and Diversity, please click here to access our Institutional Equality Objectives. A-Z of services A-Z of policies Forms
